name: Crust Technology Ltd.
goal:
Crust is the open source Unified Work Platform. It currently delivers a Salesforce alternative, a Slack Enterprise Messaging alternative, a records-based Low Code Development environment, a Unified Workspace and advanced Identity and Access Management. Crust deliberately replicates closely the feature set, user experience and build logic of market leading technology. It can be self-hosted or hosted in a cloud of your choice.

In terms of Roadmap, Crust will deliver online documents, a Trello alternative and Message Federation by the end of 2019.

All Crust intellectual property will soon be contributed to an open source foundation with a specific mandate to act in the public interest. Thereafter, all core development for Crust will take place in this community project (called “Corteza”) and will be subject to governance by an independent board. Crust products will strictly be a subset of the Corteza code base.
euInitiatives:
- Next Generation Internet
- Single Digital Market
- GDPR
